data.eml:eml: Revision of the West Palaearctic species of the genus Pales Robineau­Desvoidy (Diptera: Tachinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cerretti, Pierfilippo (2005): Revision of the West Palaearctic species of the genus Pales Robineau­Desvoidy (Diptera: Tachinidae). Zootaxa 885: 1-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170907
